Navigation
Name Rascal/Libraries/Vis/Figure/Properties/fontNames
Synopsis The available font names.
Function list[str] fontNames()
Description Gives a list of names of available fonts.
Examples 
rascal>import vis::Figure;
ok
rascal>fontNames();
list[str]: ["Abadi MT Condensed Extra Bold","Abadi MT Condensed Light","Al Bayan","Al Bayan","Al Nile","Al Nile","Al Tarikh","American Typewriter","American Typewriter","American Typewriter","American The available fonts (on the machine on which this page was generated) are //samples = [ text(f, font(f), fontSize(12), left()) | f <- fontNames()]; //render(grid(samples, size(700), gap(350, 20), left(), bottom()));
Pitfalls The available fonts are system and installation dependent.
